channel.title: Time for applying for King as Royal Blood is too short
channel.description: Time for applying for King as Royal Blood is too short. Many times I didn't just had time to step up. Please add 5 or 10 seconds more for this.

item.title: Time for applying for King as Royal Blood is too short
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
There’s plenty of time. If the king is dead, you should be anticipating the button coming up
